authors: Nektarios Benekos, Manuel Parra-Royon and Agathangelos Stylianidis

network.q: SELECT sum('mean_value') FROM ''.'interface_if_octets' WHERE ('submitter_hostgroup' =~ /^npcmp/worker$/ AND 'host' =~ /^np-cmp-0411.cern.ch$/ AND 'submitter_environment' =~ /^npcmp_master$/) AND time >= now() - 3h GROUP BY time(5m), 'value_instance'

sysload.q: SELECT mean('mean_value') FROM ''.'load' WHERE ('submitter_hostgroup' =~ /^npcmp/worker$/ AND 'host' =~ /^np-cmp-0411.cern.ch$/ AND 'submitter_environment' =~ /^npcmp_master$/) AND time >= now() - 3h GROUP BY time(5m), 'value_instance' fill(null)
